name: Parvathi Chundi
content: Parvathi Chundi | College of Information Science & Technology | University of Nebraska Omaha Parvathi Chundi Parvathi Chundi, Ph.D. Professor Computer Science email: pchundi@unomaha.edu office: PKI 284 E office phone: 402.554.4987 fax: 402.554.3284 personal website: https://faculty.ist.unomaha.edu/pchundi/ note: This profile is pulling in data from Digital Measures. Postings on personal websites or social media do not indicate that the individual is speaking on behalf of UNO. General Information General Information Biography I have a Ph. D in computer science from University at Albany, SUNY. Teaching Interests I usually teach the graduate courses on i) design and analysis of algorithms and ii) information retrieval systems. I also teach the undergraduate course on introduction to database management systems Research Interests Replicated and distributed databases, data mining, bioinformatics. Service Summary I have been a member of the faculty senate of UNO, chair of the graduate program in computer science, and a member of several committees at the department and college level.
